item.title: Compile

item.description:

Class5.java:18: error: illegal start of expression public static void dumpNpcs(); { ^ Class5.java:18: error: illegal start of expression public static void dumpNpcs(); { ^ Class5.java:18: error: ';' expected public static void dumpNpcs(); { ^ 3 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

ive tried everything and fixed one of the errors but 3 still remain… can someone please tell me what is wrong with that?

Here is the file…
